Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.routing

Interface RoutingCostFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReRouteSpecificConnectionsCostFunction
    public interface RoutingCostFunction
    Interface to calculate a cost function for the edges in order to find the best route. It provides two options: 1. Shortest: Shortest route to the destination. 2. Fastest: Fastest route to the destination.
